name: Dark Persian

attacks.name: Fascinate
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with the Defending Pokémon. This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

flavorText: Popular with women because of its beautiful fur. The leader of the Rockets keeps one as a pet.

strengths: Fascinate can force switches on coin flip
Colorless typing - works with any energy
weaknesses: Both attacks are coin flip dependent

competitiveHistory: Dark Persian was a utility Pokemon with free retreat. Fascinate offered a coin-flip Gust of Wind effect, while Poison Claws provided some offensive pressure. The free retreat made it excellent for tactical flexibility.

rulings.ruling: Fascinate does no damage - it only potentially forces a switch on heads.
The reference to 'the leader of the Rockets' in the flavor text refers to Giovanni.
